answers.a: All data of power system is observed
answers.b: To find error in measurement data
answers.c: To check the given measurement data is sufficient for state estimation

explanations.a: Network observability is not related to data of power system. It is the ability to know the system state at any point of time quickly and easily.
explanations.b: Network observability is not finding error in measurement data of power system. It is the ability to know the system state at any point of time quickly and easily.
explanations.c: Network observability is the ability to know the system state at any point of time quickly and easily.
explanations.d: Network observability is not the ratio of measure data to error.It is the ability to know the system state at any point of time quickly and easily.

questions.question: Suppression of bad data is done by selecting estimation index function as

explanations.a: It is desirable to modify the estimation algorithms in a way that will minimise the influence of the bad data on the estimates of the state vector.This won't be possible if the estimation index J(x) is chosen to be a quadratic function.
explanations.b: It is desirable to modify the estimation algorithms in a way that will minimise the influence of the bad data on the estimates of the state vector. This would be possible if the estimation index J(x) is chosen to be a non-quadratic function.
explanations.c: It is desirable to modify the estimation algorithms in a way that will minimise the influence of the bad data on the estimates of the state vector.This won't be possible if the estimation index J(x) is chosen to be a square function.
explanations.d: It is desirable to modify the estimation algorithms in a way that will minimise the influence of the bad data on the estimates of the state vector.This won't be possible if the estimation index J(x) is chosen to be a square root function.

questions.question: The method to find bad data detection is

explanations.a: Fast decoupled method is not a correct method for Finding the bad data detection.
explanations.b: Newton Raphson method is not a correct method for Finding the bad data detection.
explanations.c: Finding the bad data detection one of the correct method is Chi Square used.
explanations.d: weighted least square method is not a correct method for Finding the bad data detection.

questions.question: Power system is divided into ______sub-system to reduce computational burden in state estimation

explanations.a: Power system is divided into Generation, transmission and distribution to reduce the computational burden in state estimation.
explanations.b: Power system is divided into Generation, transmission and distribution to reduce the computational burden in state estimation.So, option (a) is correct
explanations.c: Power system is divided into Generation, transmission and distribution to reduce the computational burden in state estimation.So, option (a) is correct
explanations.d: Power system is divided into Generation, transmission and distribution to reduce the computational burden in state estimation.So, option (a) is correct
